description.en: A scary but fast, baby, Glaphan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.ar: A scary but fast, baby, Glaphan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.br: Um assustador, porém rápido, bebê Glaphan que segue seu mestre e pega itens caídos.
description.cns: 捡宠，召唤时会自动拾取周围道具。
description.de: Ein unheimliches und schnelles Glaphan, welches seinem Meister folgt und Gegenstände vom Boden aufsammelt.
description.fi: A scary but fast, baby, Glaphan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.fil: A scary but fast, baby, Glaphan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.fr: Un bébé Glaphan effrayant mais rapide, qui suit son maître et ramasse pour lui les objets tombés au sol.
description.id: Glaphan yang menakutkan tapi cepat, yang mengikuti tuannya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang yang dijatuhkan
description.it: A scary but fast, baby, Glaphan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.jp: 主人の後をついて回り、素早く落とし物を拾ってくれる、見た目は怖いけど、小さくてかわいいグラファン
description.kr: 무섭지만 빠른 새끼 글라팬은 주인을 따라다니며 드롭된 아이템을 줍습니다
description.nl: A scary but fast, baby, Glaphan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.pl: A scary but fast, baby, Glaphan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.ru: A scary but fast, baby, Glaphan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.sp: Un aterrador pero rápido Glaphan Bebé que sigue a su amo y recoge los objetos soltados.
description.sw: A scary but fast, baby, Glaphan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items
description.th: Glaphan ที่น่ากลัว แต่เร็ว ที่ตามเจ้านายของมันไปรอบๆ และหยิบของที่หล่นลงมา
description.tw: 一個可怕但速度很快的巫獸皮皮寶寶，它跟隨它的主人並撿起掉落的道具。
description.vi: Bé Glaphan đáng sợ nhưng nhanh nhẹn, đi theo chủ nhân của nó và nhặt những món đồ bị đánh rơi
